title: All About Coyotes
description: Have you ever seen a coyote? All About Coyotes provides students with an up-close look at these amazing creatures. Students will learn about what coyotes look like, where they live, and just what makes these mammals so interesting. Detailed photographs enhance the information provided by the text. Students will also learn how to identify the main idea and details as well as to recognize and use declarative sentences.
meta: coyotes, dens, howl, mammals, packs, pups
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /k/ sound
Declarative Sentences : Recognize and use declarative sentences
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word are

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
